heroIntro: Imagine waking up to Mediterranean sunshine, a short drive from Blue Flag beaches, in your own private Spanish retreat. This exceptional 3-bedroom town house in Avileses offers the perfect holiday home or second residence on the Costa Blanca—at just €279,900, it's remarkably priced at 40% less than comparable properties on Spanish islands. With 82m² of thoughtfully designed living space and a 135m² plot, this property delivers premium specification and authentic Mediterranean living without the island premium. Whether you're seeking a sun-soaked escape for summer months or a year-round sunshine retreat, Avileses provides the ideal blend of accessibility, affordability, and authentic Spanish coastal charm. The established international community here speaks your language, the healthcare is world-class, and the lifestyle—beaches, golf, fine dining—rivals any premium destination. This isn't just a property investment; it's your gateway to the Mediterranean dream at an unbeatable price point.
areaSection: Avileses is a charming coastal town in Murcia, perfectly positioned between the vibrant energy of larger Costa Blanca resorts and the tranquil appeal of smaller Mediterranean villages. Located just 20 minutes from multiple Blue Flag beaches, the area enjoys over 300 days of annual sunshine with mild winters and warm summers. The town itself maintains genuine Spanish character while welcoming an established international community. Strategically placed between major amenities and pristine coastline, Avileses offers the best of both worlds—proximity to cultural attractions, shopping, and dining, combined with peaceful residential living. The landscape transitions from charming town streets to beautiful coastal vistas, and the nearby countryside provides opportunities for outdoor activities, from hiking to water sports.
lifestyleSection: Daily life in Avileses revolves around a relaxed Mediterranean rhythm. Mornings might start with fresh coffee at a local café before heading to one of the nearby beaches for a swim. The town boasts excellent supermarkets including Mercadona and Lidl for convenient shopping, while weekly local markets offer authentic Spanish produce and regional specialties. The established expat community means English is widely spoken, making everyday interactions effortless. Healthcare is exceptional with English-speaking doctors and private clinics complementing the regional hospital. Afternoons could include golf at championship courses minutes away, seaside dining at fresh seafood restaurants, or exploring charming coastal villages. The international school options make it ideal for families seeking work-life balance. Come evening, you'll enjoy tapas with friends, sunset beach walks, and the gentle pace of Mediterranean living. It's a lifestyle where leisure isn't a luxury—it's simply how life is lived.
investmentSection: This property represents compelling investment value in the Costa Blanca market. At €3,413/m², it's priced at a premium to the Avileses average of €2,200/m² due to superior specification and finish—yet remains 40% below comparable properties on Spanish islands like Mallorca and Ibiza. The regional market shows strong momentum with 8% year-on-year growth, indicating solid appreciation potential. Holiday rental income is substantial, with comparable properties commanding €800+ per week during peak season, delivering approximately 20-25% annual returns for holiday-let investors. Whether purchased as a personal retreat or investment property, Avileses offers genuine upside. The combination of strong rental demand, growing expat community, and coastal proximity creates a resilient property market less volatile than speculative resort developments.
conclusion: This 3-bedroom town house in Avileses represents a rare opportunity to own Mediterranean lifestyle at intelligent pricing. You're investing not just in a property, but in 300+ days of annual sunshine, authentic coastal living, world-class healthcare, and a genuine international community. At €279,900—40% below island pricing—this is where value meets aspiration. Whether you're seeking a holiday retreat, second home, or investment property with strong rental returns, Avileses delivers across every dimension. The established infrastructure, welcoming expat networks, and growing market appreciation make this a compelling choice for discerning international buyers. Your Mediterranean dream awaits. healthcare.text: Healthcare in Avileses and surrounding areas is comprehensive and accessible. A regional hospital equipped with modern facilities is located approximately 25-30 minutes away, staffed with English-speaking doctors and specialists familiar with treating international patients. Private clinics throughout the area offer both preventative care and specialist services with minimal waiting times. Many healthcare professionals have experience with British and international patients, ensuring clear communication and culturally aware treatment. Pharmacies are well-stocked and conveniently located, with trained pharmacists available for advice. For non-emergency consultations, numerous private practices operate throughout Avileses, offering competitive pricing compared to UK healthcare. The healthcare system is modern, reliable, and welcoming to international residents.

faqs.question: Ist die Costa Blanca ein guter Ort zum Immobilienkauf?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Costa Blanca consistently ranks among Europe's most desirable property markets for holiday homes and second residences. The region offers 300+ days of annual sunshine, excellent healthcare, established international communities, and strong rental income potential (€800+ per week typical). The market shows 8% year-on-year appreciation, indicating solid long-term value. Properties here deliver lifestyle benefits alongside genuine investment returns.

faqs.question: Können Ausländer Immobilien in Spanien kaufen?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain without restrictions. EU and non-EU citizens have identical property rights. You'll need a Spanish NIE (tax identification number), which is straightforward to obtain. Most property transactions involve Spanish-speaking lawyers who guide international buyers through the process. The established expat community in Avileses means professional support is readily available for foreign purchasers.

faqs.question: Welche Kosten fallen beim Immobilienkauf in Spanien an?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect additional costs of approximately 8-12% including: 6-8% property transfer tax (ITP), notary fees (0.5-1%), land registry fees (0.1%), and legal fees (1%). If obtaining a mortgage, additional survey and valuation costs apply. These are standard across Spain and significantly lower than UK conveyancing costs. Your solicitor provides a detailed breakdown before purchase.

faqs.question: Kann ich als Ausländer eine Hypothek in Spanien bekommen?
faqs.answer: Yes, major Spanish banks offer mortgages to foreign buyers. Typically, loans cover 60-80% of property value with competitive interest rates. You'll need proof of income, identification, and a NIE. British buyers often find mortgage rates comparable to or better than UK equivalents. Many banks have English-speaking staff experienced with international clients. Pre-approval is recommended before property viewing to strengthen purchasing position.

faqs.question: Wie hoch sind die Lebenshaltungskosten an der Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Cost of living in Avileses is moderate and genuinely affordable compared to UK equivalents. Groceries cost 20-30% less than British supermarkets, especially at local markets. Utilities (electricity, water, gas) average €100-150 monthly. Dining out is inexpensive—quality meals €8-15, with Spanish wine €2-5 per bottle. Healthcare costs are reasonable, with private consultations €50-100. Overall, a comfortable lifestyle costs 25-40% less than equivalent UK living, making retirement or semi-retirement highly feasible.

faqs.question: Wie ist das Wetter an der Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Exceptional. Avileses enjoys Mediterranean climate with 300+ days of annual sunshine, mild winters (average 12-14°C), and warm summers (28-32°C). Rainfall is minimal, concentrated in autumn and spring. The weather is ideal for outdoor living year-round—beach swimming from May to October, comfortable temperatures for golf and walking in winter months. This predictable, sunny climate is why Costa Blanca attracts international residents globally and supports thriving outdoor lifestyle.

faqs.question: Wie weit ist die Costa Blanca von Deutschland entfernt?
faqs.answer: Very accessible. Alicante Airport, 90 minutes from Avileses, offers direct flights to London and major UK airports with multiple daily services. Flight time is approximately 2.5 hours. Budget airlines make weekends in the UK feasible and affordable (flights often €30-80 return). The proximity makes maintaining UK connections easy while enjoying Mediterranean life—ideal for those with family or business interests in both locations.

faqs.question: What rental income can I expect from a holiday home in Avileses?
faqs.answer: Strong returns are achievable. Properties comparable to this 3-bedroom town house typically command €800+ per week during peak summer months (June-August) and €400-600 during shoulder seasons. Conservative annual rental income estimates suggest €20,000-28,000, representing 20-25% returns on property value. Many owners employ management companies (10-15% commission) to handle bookings and maintenance, making passive income genuinely passive. Rental demand remains robust with growing tourism to Costa Blanca.

faqs.question: Why is this property 40% cheaper than Spanish island properties?
faqs.answer: Avileses is a genuine Mediterranean town rather than a premium resort island destination. Properties on Mallorca, Ibiza, and Menorca command island premiums—20-40% higher prices for identical specifications due to perceived exclusivity and limited land availability. Avileses offers identical sunshine, beaches, and lifestyle at mainland prices. This represents intelligent value—you're purchasing the same Mediterranean experience without paying for island marketing and scarcity premiums. Smart buyers recognize this as exceptional opportunity.
